dcterms:creator: Geoff Boeing
dcterms:description: The dataset contains GPS traces of 7579 taxis in Shanghai from April 15 to April 21, 2015, with an average sampling rate of roughly every 10 seconds, totaling over 4 million records. Each record includes taxi ID, date, time, longitude, latitude, and an occupied flag indicating whether the taxi is occupied.
dcterms:title: Shanghai Taxi Trajectory Data (Shanghai Dataset)

dcterms:creator: Jing Yuan
Yu Zheng
Chengyang Zhang
Wenlei Xie
Xing Xie
Guangzhong Sun
Yan Huang
dcterms:description: This dataset contains one-week trajectories of 10,357 taxis in Beijing from February 2 to February 8, 2008, with an average sampling rate of 177 seconds and about 15 million records. Each record consists of date, time, longitude, and latitude.
dcterms:title: Beijing Taxi Trajectory Data (Beijing Dataset)

dcterms:creator: Yuebing Liang
Zhan Zhao
dcterms:description: Weather data collected from Weather Underground, providing weather conditions (e.g., fair, cloudy, rain, storm) every half hour for Shanghai and every 2-3 hours for Beijing.
dcterms:title: Weather Data

dcterms:creator: Can Yang
Gyozo Gidofalvi
dcterms:description: Fast Map Matching is an algorithm that integrates hidden Markov models with precomputation to improve the efficiency of map matching for GPS trajectories.
dcterms:title: Fast Map Matching
